sentences.english: The entity lacking self-discipline is only in a state of disunity .
sentences.chinese: 缺乏自律的整體永遠都只是一盤散沙。

sentences.english: Democracy is fine , but coalition politics will always hold us back.
sentences.chinese: 民煮固然好，但是一盤散沙的政策會永遠阻礙我們。

sentences.english: But Greater Syria is more of a hodgepodge.
sentences.chinese: 與之相比，大敘利亞更像是一盤散沙。
